posts.post_content:
Recently upgraded my Green Cobb so making this available. Asking $TRADED for it. Card is really nice for the grade. Formerly in a BVG 2 holder. Has a small crease left to right but image and color are really good.  Really nice card.

I will consider trades…..I’m looking to get a PSA 3 Cobb bat on, if you have one available, let me know. Could work a deal on a 2 also…..

I’m available via PM.  

Thanks for looking!

Jeff

Agree. I’m a bat off fan but that green just pops!
